title: The 3am Incident
body: Agnes rattling pipes; complaints from Room 8 and Mr. Dowd.

choices.text: Go to Room 7 and speak to Agnes directly
Call maintenance and tell guests it is a pressure valve
Send complimentary bourbon to complaining rooms

title: Professor Weir Has Evidence
body: Professor Weir claims she has incontrovertible proof of a presence.

choices.text: Quietly confirm: yes, she is real

title: Reginald and Room Service
body: Reginald is rearranging place settings and guests notice.

choices.text: Explain it as personalized place setting service

title: Derek is Live
body: An influencer is streaming the hallway and may stir up guests.

choices.text: Negotiate a cut of his merch revenue

title: Something in Room 12
body: Staff report odd activity in Room 12.

choices.text: Lock the room and say nothing

title: Beatrice Moss Asks The Question
body: The travel writer asks if the hotel is haunted.

choices.text: Say only some guests experience things

title: The Kowalski Kid
body: A child is wandering the halls and talking to someone invisible.

choices.text: Gently bring the child back upstairs
Sit near the child and wait

title: The Health Inspector
body: A surprise visit from a health inspector.

choices.text: Let her go wherever she likes

title: The Wheel
body: A mysterious wheel appears in the dining room.

choices.text: Ask couple to sit at wheel

title: The Water Mark
body: A faded watermark on the wall draws attention.

title: The Man Who Came From Vanport
body: A guest recognizes a photograph tied to Vanport.

choices.text: Return photograph to lost and found

title: What Came Up From Below
body: Something was found in the cellar.

title: The Columbus Day Storm
body: A violent storm approaches; staff must prepare.
